subject: p11474065
History: Year old woman with SubQ air, subQ air improvement.
Impression: In comparison to the recent radiograph of 1 day earlier, subcutaneous emphysema has slightly decreased in extent, and pneumomediastinum also appears improved. Heterogeneous opacities in the right lung have slightly worsened in the right upper lobe and slightly improved at the right lung base. Left basilar opacities have nearly resolved, and a small left pleural effusion has decreased in size.
